'''Aralia "Bangaku" Shelf''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Aralia "Bangaku" Shelf is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
